LanguageData.PrimitiveStoolStone.label: Taburete de piedra
LanguageData.PrimitiveStoolStone_Blueprint.label: stone stool (blueprint)
LanguageData.PrimitiveStoolStone_Frame.label: stone stool (building)
LanguageData.PrimitiveStoolWood.label: Taburete de madera
LanguageData.PrimitiveStoolWood.description: Es un taburete auténtico, hecho a la manera de los encontrados en las ruinas de la gente roja del árbol en Xentis.
LanguageData.PrimitiveStoolWood_Blueprint.label: wooden stool (blueprint)
LanguageData.PrimitiveStoolWood_Frame.label: wooden stool (building)
LanguageData.PrimitiveStoolWood_Frame.description: Is an authentic stool, fashioned after those found in the ruins of the Red Tree People on Xentis Ham.
LanguageData.SimplePillow.label: Almohada
LanguageData.SimplePillow.description: Descansa tu tushie en este cojín de felpa!
LanguageData.SimplePillow_Blueprint.label: pillow (blueprint)
LanguageData.SimplePillow_Blueprint_Install.label: pillow (blueprint)
LanguageData.SimplePillow_Frame.label: pillow (building)
LanguageData.SimplePillow_Frame.description: Rest your tushie on this plushy cushion!
LanguageData.SlabChair.label: Silla de losa
LanguageData.SlabChair.description: Quien dijo que la piedra no es cómoda? Prueba que todo el mundo mal con esta réplica de una silla de piedra perfectamente cómoda.
LanguageData.SlabChair_Blueprint.label: slab chair (blueprint)
LanguageData.SlabChair_Blueprint_Install.label: slab chair (blueprint)
LanguageData.SlabChair_Frame.label: slab chair (building)
LanguageData.SlabChair_Frame.description: Whoever said that stone is not comfortable? Prove everyone wrong with this replica of a perfectly comfortable stony chair.
LanguageData.FoldingStool.label: Taburete plegable
LanguageData.FoldingStool.description: Un pedazo de cuero y un poco de acero - et voilà! Una forma ingeniosa de sentarse, inventada por el Galga Ler en Achron V.
LanguageData.FoldingStool_Blueprint.label: folding stool (blueprint)
LanguageData.FoldingStool_Blueprint_Install.label: folding stool (blueprint)
LanguageData.FoldingStool_Frame.label: folding stool (building)
LanguageData.FoldingStool_Frame.description: A piece of leather and some steel - et voilà! An ingenious way of sitting, invented by the Galga Ler on Achron V.
LanguageData.Bench.label: Banco
LanguageData.Bench.description: Una simple plataforma sobre la que sentarse.
LanguageData.Bench_Blueprint.label: bench (blueprint)
LanguageData.Bench_Blueprint_Install.label: bench (blueprint)
LanguageData.Bench_Frame.label: bench (building)
LanguageData.Bench_Frame.description: A simple platform on which to sit.
LanguageData.EggArmchair.label: Sillón de huevo
LanguageData.EggArmchair.description: Sillón de huevos de línea Millenium. Se siente como una chica - sentarse en un huevo.
LanguageData.EggArmchair_Blueprint.label: egg armchair (blueprint)
LanguageData.EggArmchair_Blueprint_Install.label: egg armchair (blueprint)
LanguageData.EggArmchair_Frame.label: egg armchair (building)
LanguageData.EggArmchair_Frame.description: Millenium Line Egg Armchair. Feel like a chick - sit in an egg..
LanguageData.RusticCouch.label: Sofá rústico.
LanguageData.RusticCouch.description: Un sofá es la pieza de mobiliario definitiva para la satisfacción de sentado. No hará que los colonos sean perezosos, al menos en teoría.
LanguageData.RusticCouch_Blueprint.label: rustic couch (blueprint)
LanguageData.RusticCouch_Blueprint_Install.label: rustic couch (blueprint)
LanguageData.RusticCouch_Frame.label: rustic couch (building)
LanguageData.RusticCouch_Frame.description: A couch is the ultimate furniture piece for sitting satisfaction. Relaxing on it won't make colonists lazy, in theory at least.
LanguageData.ClutterCouchA.label: Sofá.
LanguageData.ClutterCouchA.description: Un sofá es el tipo de muebles que podría ser adecuado para dos, pero es utilizable por sólo uno. No hará que los colonos sean perezosos, al menos en teoría.
LanguageData.ClutterCouchA_Blueprint.label: couch (blueprint)
LanguageData.ClutterCouchA_Blueprint_Install.label: couch (blueprint)
LanguageData.ClutterCouchA_Frame.label: couch (building)
LanguageData.ClutterCouchA_Frame.description: A couch is type of furniture that could be suitable for two, but is usable by only one. It won't make colonists lazy, in theory at least.
LanguageData.MilleniumCouch.label: Sofá de milenio.
LanguageData.MilleniumCouch.description: El entrenador de la Línea del Milenio es la pieza de mobiliario definitiva para la satisfacción del asiento. No hará que los colonos sean perezosos, al menos en teoría.
LanguageData.MilleniumCouch_Blueprint.label: millenium couch (blueprint)
LanguageData.MilleniumCouch_Blueprint_Install.label: millenium couch (blueprint)
LanguageData.MilleniumCouch_Frame.label: millenium couch (building)
LanguageData.MilleniumCouch_Frame.description: Millenium Line couch is the ultimate furniture piece for sitting satisfaction. Relaxing on it won't make colonists lazy, in theory at least.
LanguageData.PodChair.label: Celda holográfica.
LanguageData.PodChair.description: ¡Entre a galahoo, él mismo! ¿Necesita un ser humano?
LanguageData.PodChair_Blueprint.label: holographical cell (blueprint)
LanguageData.PodChair_Blueprint_Install.label: holographical cell (blueprint)
LanguageData.PodChair_Frame.label: holographical cell (building)
LanguageData.PodChair_Frame.description: Enter to galahoo, himself ! It need a human ?
LanguageData.PrimitiveTableStone.label: Pequeña mesa de piedra.
LanguageData.PrimitiveTableStone.description: La gente come fuera de las mesas cuando las sillas se colocan frente a ellos.
LanguageData.PrimitiveTableStone_Blueprint.label: small stone table (blueprint)
LanguageData.PrimitiveTableStone_Frame.label: small stone table (building)
LanguageData.PrimitiveTableStone_Frame.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.TableStone.label: Mesa de piedra.
LanguageData.TableStone.description: La gente come fuera de las mesas cuando las sillas se colocan frente a ellos.
LanguageData.TableStone_Blueprint.label: stone table (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableStone_Blueprint_Install.label: stone table (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableStone_Frame.label: stone table (building)
LanguageData.TableStone_Frame.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.PrimitiveTableWood.label: Mesa de madera primitiva.
LanguageData.PrimitiveTableWood.description: La gente come fuera de las mesas cuando las sillas se colocan frente a ellos.
LanguageData.PrimitiveTableWood_Blueprint.label: primitive wood table (blueprint)
LanguageData.PrimitiveTableWood_Frame.label: primitive wood table (building)
LanguageData.PrimitiveTableWood_Frame.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.TableSmall.label: Mesa (pequeña).
LanguageData.TableSmall.description: La gente come fuera de las mesas cuando las sillas se colocan frente a ellos.
LanguageData.TableSmall_Blueprint.label: table (small) (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableSmall_Blueprint_Install.label: table (small) (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableSmall_Frame.label: table (small) (building)
LanguageData.TableSmall_Frame.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.TeaTable.label: Mesa de té
LanguageData.TeaTable.description: Los colonos comerán de las mesas cuando una silla esté frente a ella. Esta pequeña mesa de cristal es adecuada para 1.
LanguageData.TeaTable_Blueprint.label: tea table (blueprint)
LanguageData.TeaTable_Blueprint_Install.label: tea table (blueprint)
LanguageData.TeaTable_Frame.label: tea table (building)
LanguageData.TeaTable_Frame.description: Colonists will eat off of tables when a chair is facing it. This tiny glass table is suitable for 1.
LanguageData.MilleniumTable.label: Mesa de milenio.
LanguageData.MilleniumTable.description: ¡Esta mesa magníficamente diseñada es la pieza central perfecta para cualquier comedor!
LanguageData.MilleniumTable_Blueprint.label: millenium table (blueprint)
LanguageData.MilleniumTable_Blueprint_Install.label: millenium table (blueprint)
LanguageData.MilleniumTable_Frame.label: millenium table (building)
LanguageData.MilleniumTable_Frame.description: This splendidly designed table is the perfect center-piece for any dining room!
LanguageData.ClutterLocker.label: Armario.
LanguageData.ClutterLocker.description: Un armario que puede almacenar un conjunto de ropa para intercambio de equipo fácil. A un colonizador se le puede asignar la propiedad de este casillero. Viene con la unidad del contratista del polvo para esa sensación buena, antigua.
LanguageData.ClutterLocker_Blueprint.label: locker (blueprint)
LanguageData.ClutterLocker_Blueprint_Install.label: locker (blueprint)
LanguageData.ClutterLocker_Frame.label: locker (building)
LanguageData.ClutterLocker_Frame.description: A locker that can store a set clothing for easy outfit swapping. A colonist can be assigned ownership of this locker. It comes with dust contractor unit for that good, ancient feeling.
LanguageData.Commode.label: Cómoda.
LanguageData.Commode.description: Un lugar para los colonos para guardar sus pertenencias personales. Cuando se coloca con una cama aumentará ligeramente la comodidad y la eficacia del resto. Hasta 5 artículos.
LanguageData.Commode_Blueprint.label: commode (blueprint)
LanguageData.Commode_Blueprint_Install.label: commode (blueprint)
LanguageData.Commode_Frame.label: commode (building)
LanguageData.Commode_Frame.description: A place for colonist to store personal belongings. When placed with a bed it will increase comfort and rest effectiveness slightly. Up to 5 items.
LanguageData.Storage_Locker.label: Armario de ropa.
LanguageData.Storage_Locker.description: Los transportadores transportan ropa aquí para su almacenamiento. Hasta 5 artículos.
LanguageData.Storage_Locker_Blueprint.label: apparel cupboard (blueprint)
LanguageData.Storage_Locker_Blueprint_Install.label: apparel cupboard (blueprint)
LanguageData.Storage_Locker_Frame.label: apparel cupboard (building)
LanguageData.Storage_Locker_Frame.description: Haulers carry apparel here for storage. Up to 5 items.
LanguageData.ClutterStylist.label: Barbería.
LanguageData.ClutterStylist_Blueprint.label: barber bench (blueprint)
LanguageData.ClutterStylist_Frame.label: barber bench (building)
LanguageData.Dresser.label: Tocador.
LanguageData.Dresser.description: Una aparador para hacer que los peones se vean más rápidos.
LanguageData.Dresser_Blueprint.label: dressing table (blueprint)
LanguageData.Dresser_Blueprint_Install.label: dressing table (blueprint)
LanguageData.Dresser_Frame.label: dressing table (building)
LanguageData.Dresser_Frame.description: A Dresser to make Pawns look more snappy.
LanguageData.Bookcase.label: Librero.
LanguageData.Bookcase.description: Una librería con una amplia variedad de libros. Hasta 5 artículos.
LanguageData.Bookcase_Blueprint.label: bookcase (blueprint)
LanguageData.Bookcase_Blueprint_Install.label: bookcase (blueprint)
LanguageData.Bookcase_Frame.label: bookcase (building)
LanguageData.Bookcase_Frame.description: A bookcase with a wide variety of books. Up to 5 items.
LanguageData.EndTableSimple.label: Mesa final.
LanguageData.EndTableSimple.description: Esta pequeña mesa va bien con una cama. Cuando se coloca con una cama aumentará ligeramente la comodidad y la eficacia del resto. Hasta 5 artículos.
LanguageData.EndTableSimple_Blueprint.label: end table (blueprint)
LanguageData.EndTableSimple_Blueprint_Install.label: end table (blueprint)
LanguageData.EndTableSimple_Frame.label: end table (building)
LanguageData.EndTableSimple_Frame.description: This small table goes well with a bed. When placed with a bed it will increase comfort and rest effectiveness slightly. Up to 5 items.
LanguageData.EndTable.label: Mesa final con lámpara.
LanguageData.EndTable.description: Una pequeña mesa con una lámpara y un cajón. Sería una buena adición junto a una cama. Utiliza 20 W para iluminar un área pequeña.
LanguageData.EndTable_Blueprint.label: end table with lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.EndTable_Blueprint_Install.label: end table with lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.EndTable_Frame.label: end table with lamp (building)
LanguageData.EndTable_Frame.description: A small table with a lamp and a drawer. It would be a nice addition beside a bed. Uses 20 W to light a small area.
LanguageData.JournalTable.label: Tabla de diarios.
LanguageData.JournalTable.description: Una mesa decorativa con un diario en él. Los colonos pueden reunirse aquí para discutir el majestuoso diario y el poderoso corcel que es la mesa en la que descansa.
LanguageData.JournalTable_Blueprint.label: journal table (blueprint)
LanguageData.JournalTable_Blueprint_Install.label: journal table (blueprint)
LanguageData.JournalTable_Frame.label: journal table (building)
LanguageData.JournalTable_Frame.description: A decorative table with a journal on it. Colonists can gather here to discuss the majestic journal and the mighty steed that is the table that it rests upon.
LanguageData.TentDeployed.label: Ayuda de la tienda
LanguageData.TentDeployed_Blueprint_Install.label: tent support (blueprint)
